statements: DELETE FROM employee_concerns WHERE concern='Harassment' AND status='Pending'
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 5 AND employee_id = 101;
DELETE FROM acknowledgements WHERE acknowledgement_status = true AND alert_id = 7;
DELETE FROM Concern WHERE submission_time < '2022-01-01' AND concern_id IN (SELECT concern_id FROM Alert WHERE alert_time < '2021-12-15');
DELETE FROM Acknowledgements WHERE acknowledged_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Alerts WHERE alert_id = 100 AND concern_id = 200 OR alert_message LIKE '%urgent%';
